TextView.android:text: Welcome to the Android developer guides. The documents listed in the left navigation teach you how to build Android apps using APIs in the Android framework and other libraries. Codelabs: Short, self-paced tutorials that each cover a discrete topic. Most codelabs step you through the process of building a small app, or adding a new feature to an existing app. End-to-end training: A guided path through the process of learning how to build Android apps. Online training: If you prefer to learn online with videos, check out the Developing Android Apps course on Udacity (trailer embedded here), and other online courses below.
